alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dooly; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Dooly, southeastern Sumter and western Crisp Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Huntington, or near Americus, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Americus, Cordele, Leslie, De Soto, Desoto, Cobb, Sumter, Lamar, Fort Early, Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, Richwood, Huntington, Maddox, and Raines. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and west central Georgia.
